title: Child Dianetics
description: How do you establish a trusting relationship with your child? How much control is too much? How do you train a child without breaking him? What causes childhood revolts? Every parent is aware of the tremendous potential that their child has. How do you raise a child, guide him through the pitfalls of growing up without breaking his spirit or dulling his perceptions? Child Dianetics contains vital data on how to improve your interpersonal relationships with your children, make friends with them and earn their love and respect.
author: L. Ron Hubbard
